header.div: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task and write at least 250 words.

div.p: Present a written argument or case to an educated reader with no specialist knowledge of the following topics.

p.b: In most countries, young people form a large proportion of those who are unemployed. Why is this the case, and what can be done to solve the problem?

div.p: You should use your own ideas, knowledge and experience and support your arguments with examples and relevant evidence.
